item.description:
NEW!!! Healthy Living Food Program - A comprehensive Enrichment Program For Healing and Education

Join our team Rosana Gijsen, Joe Lucier, Dorothy Torrey and Rain Philips (Owner and operator of The Larches) for many programs including a Tong Ren 3 hour intensive and hands on training, an incredible 2 or 5-Day healing, rejuvenation and education program and more.

This Open house is April 11 1 - 5 at no charge ~ We will introduce ourselves and introduce the upcoming programs. Healthy raw vegan snacks and drinks will be served.

This is an opportunity of a Lifetime - Be Empowered and Take Charge of your Health! For more information go to: http://www.livefoodcu...
item.name: Healthy Living Food Program - Open House - Free of Charge
